title: The Pixies-Indie Cindy (2014)
description:
Indie Cindy is the fifth studio album by the American alternative rock band The Pixies. Released in April 2014, it's the band's first album since Trompe le Monde (1991), and the first Pixies album not to feature bass guitar player Kim Deal.
The album combines all the songs from the band's 2013-14 extended play releases Ã¢â‚¬â€ EP1, EP2, and EP3 Ã¢â‚¬â€ which were recorded and produced in 2012 by Gil Norton, who produced previous Pixies albums Doolittle, Bossanova, and Trompe le Monde.
